welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Baytunya, where the blend of ancient history and modern culture creates a truly unique charm. Get ready to immerse yourself in our vibrant markets, rich cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories exploring our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Sde Dov Airport provides exclusive services for high-profile travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
